questions.question: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?

answers.answer: If I had 1 million euros, I would give you 1000 euros and 10 000 if I win tickets. Then I send 200 000 euros at associations who fight against the pollution. I build a farme to can have a big ground of culture. I would travel a lot. I would discover the world and would see beautiful places and differents cultures. I want also enjoy of this with my family and my friends. I want run, move, look, sleep, nothing do, that I never eat before a lot of things differents like cuberdons, exotics fruits, spices and chocolate!
